name: Darkwood Attempt
description:
Basically my attempt at creating a Darkwood clone so it's a topdown perspective and you have a cone of vision.

I used the catacombs art from Szadi on itch so credit to them for the amazing art! And I got the sound effects from the unity asset store made by ida software LLC and the music from N.911Music also on the asset store so also credit to them for some amazing audio.

Player and the zombie were done by me so thats why they look awful! :0 There is only two levels so you might finish it in five mins.

Also FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED!

Controls!: WASD to move and hold down the mouse button and let go to attack (though the animations are a bit off sometimes)
